scenario_text.value:
(Hm?
Saki and Floramon are talking over there.)

...feeling better...
...more than...in our world...

...really?
That...great to hear...

Yeah...if we’re okay without...
...still have more time...

(I can’t hear well from over here.
But they’re facing each other talking.)

(She said “great to hear.”
So maybe their bad blood is gone.)

(But...something seems off.
They’re not always making eye contact.)

(Hmm... Looks like Saki’s giving Floramon
a hard time.)

(Her emotions go straight into action,
so she’s mad one minute, calm the next.)

(I wonder how that’s playing out in the
current situation.)
(Saki’s attitude is...)
Totally relaxed.
Pretty optimistic.
Nice and cheerful.

(Although her moods change,
she seems relaxed when she’s in a good mood.)

(That’s better than being needlessly angry.
...I guess.)
(I guess she’s pretty optimistic.)

(She just rejected Floramon once when
she got scared for a second.)

(Maybe she doesn’t really believe they’ll
betray us.)

(In that case, she’s being manipulative.
Poor Floramon...)
(I couldn’t hear what was “great.”)

(If she’s cheerful at a time like this,
that might be a really good sign.)

(It’s way better than staying angry,
at least.)
Huh?

(Oh, they turned this way and are waving.
I should wave back.)
(They’ve calmed down a bit.)
So, Floramon... Are you listening to me?
Oh! Y-yes! What is it?

(They may be doing better than the others,
but they still don’t seem comfortable.)

(Saki and Floramon are talking.
I should leave them be for now.)
